wordGroup: common prosperity 共同繁荣；共同富裕
economic prosperity 经济繁荣；发展生产
growing prosperity 越来越欣欣向荣
prosperity and depression 繁荣与萧条

sentences.en: Their prosperity depends on export-led growth.
sentences.cn: 他们的繁荣依靠的是出口带来的增长。

sentences.en: Our future prosperity depends on economic growth.
sentences.cn: 我们未来的繁荣昌盛依赖经济的发展。

sentences.en: He was pursuing a utopian dream of world prosperity.
sentences.cn: 他那时在追求一个不切实际的世界繁荣之梦。
